meanings.definition: Serving as an introduction or preface.
meanings.sent1: The introductory chapter of the book explained the main characters.
meanings.sent2: The teacher gave an introductory speech before the class started.
meanings.sent3: The introductory music played before the movie began, setting the mood.
meanings.sent4: The first few sentences of the speech acted as an introductory handshake with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The introductory lesson on fractions made math easier to understand.

meanings.definition: Designed to introduce or orient someone to a subject or topic.
meanings.sent1: The introductory course on photography covered basic camera functions.
meanings.sent2: The museum offers an introductory tour for visitors new to art history.
meanings.sent3: The introductory video tutorial made learning the software fun and engaging.
meanings.sent4: The introductory paragraph of the essay was like a map guiding the reader through the topic.
meanings.sent5: The introductory workshop on gardening inspired many to start their own gardens.
